title: Headset line sequence
answer:
The headset delivered with your phone adopts the American line sequence that prevails in the industry.  


 You can press the hook key on the headset to answer or end a call, or to play or suspend a song. 

 To answer a call, press the hook key. To end a call, press and hold the hook key. To play or suspend a song, press the hook key. 

 The headset delivered with your phone does not have volume keys but your phone is compatible with headsets that have volume keys.
